name: dice_default_message
value:
Welcome to Dice game bot
!dice help

name: dice_default_admin_message
value:
Welcome to Dice game bot
!dice admin help

name: dice_game_created
value: The game is created for {count} of players, you have 30 seconds to join send !dice join

name: dice_game_wrong_creation
value: (n) You have to put a balance, send "!dice <balance>"

name: dice_game_invalid_balance
value: (n) The balance must be multiples of 500 and less than 5000

name: dice_game_already_created
value: (n) There is a game already created send "!dice join" to join

name: dice_game_already_start
value: (n) There is already a game, please wait for game to end

name: dice_game_not_exist
value: (n) There is no game available right now send "!dice new" to create a new game

name: dice_game_player_notfound
value:
(n) You have not joined the game
{nickname}({id})

name: dice_game_start
value:
The game has started and the players are:

{list}

name: dice_game_make_a_guess
value: /me You have 15 seconds to guess a number between 1 and 50.

name: dice_game_player_turn
dice_game_player_not_pick
value:
(n) You didn't choose your opponent so this round will be ignored
{nickname} ({id} )

name: dice_game_player_rewarded
value:
ü•≥ Congratulations, you guessed the correct number, you will be rewarded with 500 points

{nickname} ( {id} )

name: dice_game_ask_player_balance
value:
üí∞ Your balance is: {balance}
Please select your bet amount in multiples of 500

name: dice_game_ask_player_balance_already_500
value: üí∞ Your balance is: 500, All your balance will be bet.

name: dice_game_pvp_draw
value: (n) This game draw, so the game will be replay

name: dice_game_player_out
value: And you have been eliminated, better luck next time.

name: dice_game_winner
value:
üéâ Congratulations to the winning player: {nickname} ({id} )

Other winners:{list}

name: dice_game_player_balance_500_error
value: (n) The amount must be a multiple of 500

name: dice_message_score
value:
Your rank and total points:

Rank: {rank}
Total: {total} points 
{nickname} ( {id} )

name: dice_message_no_score
value:
You currently have no points in this bot
{nickname} ( {id} )

name: dice_help_admin_message
value: !dice admin refresh = update last active date

value.msg: The bot has been successfully joined.
This group requires you to have earned a higher user level.
You've joined the maximum permitted number of groups.
This group no longer seems to exist.
It seems that you're banned from this group.
It looks like you're already in this group!
This group is restricted to new users.
Perhaps you've created too many accounts?
This group can only be joined from a game.

name: dice_auto_leave_message
value: /me Sorry, You haven't played for the past five days so I'm leaving this group :(

name: dice_auto_leave_log
value: /me I left this group [{name}] becurse it inactive group, i am still in {count} groups.

name: dice_message_status_empty
value: (n) There is no status for you, play and try agin.

name: dice_admin_not_authorized_message
value: /me (n) You are not authorized to user this command

name: dice_admin_not_authorized_message
value: /me (n) You are not authorized to user this command

name: dice_only_owner_message
value: (n) Only owner can use this command.
